A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not sure what movie many of these other reviewers went to see. I loved the movie and enjoyed the story. There were a few things that kind of bothered me\, Leia flying through space and Poe prank calling a star destroyer. But they weren't enough to take away from the rest of the movie. \n\nThe best thing I c say is to go s it with an open mind before you buy into the negative reviews. It is not perfect\, but it's worth going to see in the theatre and then drawing your own conclusions.
